name: The Flip Side
description:
2 Realities one 3D Platformer! Switch between them to jump and smash your way to the top of the world......... Oh yeah and don't fall off and die......
Made for the Epic Games 2019 Spring Game Jam
 This is not an Asset Flip all Game Assets were modeled textured and hand key animated for the Jam. Including all sound effects and music which were recorded and designed during the Jam.
Play with Keyboard and Mouse or Gamepad/PS4 controller

WASD / Left Joystick - Move
Shift / Left Joystick button - Run
Mouse/ Right Joystick - Camera
Space / X - Jump
E / R2/ Right Trigger - Switch Reality
Left Mouse button / Square - Punch
P / Start- Pause
